page.title: 01Holy Family Church & School
page.content: The Parish and School of Holy Family, Sale Moor. Since 1885 the area of Sale and Sale Moor was served by the parish of St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church, Hope Road, Sale. In 1960 land measuring 2.5 acres on the West side of the parish,on Old Hall Road was purchased by Cheshire Education Authority for education purposes.As there had been a great increase in house building in this area, the number of Catholic families had increased and St.Joseph's School in Hope Road could no longer cope with the demand for places. In March 1967, 1.85 acres of the Old Hall Road land was bought by the Shrewsbury Diocese on behalf of St. Joseph's for Â£3,800 and our School was built.
